TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Calendar extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 代表一个控件，此控件允许用户使用可视的日历显示来选择日期。

span.span: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A本身，或作为下拉列表的一部分，可以使用控件控件。A control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 支持仅公历。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. 下表提供了有关通常与相关联的任务的信息。The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the . |任务Task|实现Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |具有显示一个月、 整个年或十年。Have the display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|设置到月、 年或十年中的属性。Set the property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |指定用户是否可以选择一个日期、 的日期，范围或多个日期范围。Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|使用。Use the .| |指定日期，不能同时选择。Specify dates that cannot be selected.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |指定的日期范围的显示。Specify the range of dates that the displays.|使用和属性。Use the and properties.| |指定是否突出显示当前日期。Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|使用 属性。Use the property. 默认情况下，是`true`。By default, is `true`.| |更改的大小。Change the size of the .|使用或设置属性。Use a or set the property to a . 请注意，如果你设置和属性，则实际日历不会更改其大小。Note that if you set the and properties of a , the actual calendar does not change its size.| 控件提供使用鼠标或键盘的基本导航。The control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard. 下表总结了键盘导航。The following table summarizes keyboard navigation. |组合键Key Combination||操作Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |箭头ARROW||更改属性如果属性未设置为。Changes the property if the property is not set to .| |箭头ARROW||更改的月份属性。Changes the month of the property. 请注意，不会更改。Note that the does not change.| |箭头ARROW||更改的年份，该值。Changes the year of the . 请注意，不会更改。Note that the does not change.| |SHIFT + 箭头SHIFT+ARROW||如果未设置为或，扩展的所选日期范围。If is not set to or , extends the range of selected dates.| |HomeHOME||更改到当前月份的第一天。Changes the to the first day of the current month.| |HomeHOME||更改的月份年的第一个月。Changes the month of the to the first month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |HomeHOME||更改的年份，该值在十年的第一年。Changes the year of the to the first year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||更改与当前月份的最后一天。Changes the to the last day of the current month.| |EndEND||更改的月份年份的最后一个月。Changes the month of the to the last month of the year. 不会更改。The does not change.| |EndEND||更改的年份，该值十年中的最后一年。Changes the year of the to the last year of the decade. 不会更改。The does not change.| |Ctrl+向上键CTRL+UP ARROW|任意Any|切换到下一个更大。Switches to the next larger . 如果已，任何操作。If is already , no action.| |Ctrl+向下键CTRL+DOWN ARROW|任意Any|切换到下一个较小。Switches to the next smaller . 如果已，任何操作。If is already , no action.| |空格键或 enter 键SPACEBAR or ENTER| 或 or |交换机到或由已设定焦点的项表示。Switches to the or represented by focused item.| ## 自定义日历控件Customizing the Calendar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[日历样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下图显示了两个控件，与中断日期，并选择一个，另一个没有。The following illustration shows two controls, one with selections and blackout dates and one without. ![月历控件](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "月历控件")![Calendar controls](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "Calendar controls") 日历控件Calendar controls 下面的代码和 XAML 创建带有两个页面类似于上图中的控件。The following code and XAML creates a page with two controls that is similar to the previous illustration. summary.span: 获取标记为不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.

value.span: 不可选择的日期的集合。

span.span: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期将显示为灰色并交叉出在日历上。Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar. 若要使过去的所有日期不可选，可以使用方法提供的此属性返回的集合。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 类型的一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下面的示例创建有无法选择某些日期。The following example creates a that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![不能选择的日期的日历。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "不能选择的日期的日历。")![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") 不能选择的日期的日历Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the date to display.
The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定日历的显示和什么位于日历中具有焦点。The and properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar. 用户可以更改仅当设为 Month，但用户可能会更改日历时在年和十年模式下。The user can change the only when is set to Month, but the user might change the when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode. 下表描述了模式如何更改。The following table describes how the mode changes the . |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month| 当用户导航到不同的月份的更改。 changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |年Year|月发生更改时用户单击或导航到不同的月份。The month of changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |十年Decade|年份，该值发生更改时用户单击或导航到另一年。The year of changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| 如果其值是在范围内指定的日期，则忽略和属性。 is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码将设置与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以限制的范围通过设置和属性。You can restrict the range of a by setting the and properties. 用户不能向下滚动到或选择在此范围之外的日期。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果你设置属性后，将日期，设置为相同的值。If you set the property to a date that is after , is set to the same value as . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码将设置与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以通过设置限制的日历范围和属性。You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the and properties. 用户不能向下滚动到或选择在此范围之外的日期。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果你设置到之前的日期属性，设置为相同的值。If you set the property to a date that is before , is set to the same value as . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码将设置与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode DisplayMode { System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示日历是显示月份、年份还是十年期。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.

value.span: 一个指示 应显示的时间长度的值。

span.span: A value that indicates what length of time the should display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个月、 年、 或十年，可以显示日历。A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade. 下表列出了用户如何导航到每种模式。The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode. |DisplayModeDisplayMode|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month|若要导航到年份模式下，单击月标题。To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |年Year|要导航到十年模式下，请单击年标题。To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading. 若要导航到月份模式下，单击显示的月份之一。To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |十年Decade|若要导航到年份模式下，单击显示的年份之一。To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个显示月份中每一年和句柄的日历事件，以便当用户单击在上一个月或年，日历不会更改其。The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its . [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#4)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#4)] [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#5)]

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法，以支持键盘导航。 overrides the method to support keyboard navigation. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`击键，如按箭头键，当执行导航操作。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
The date currently selected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| 使用此属性时设置为。Use this property when is set to . 在其他模式下，此属性将始终为中的第一个日期。In other modes, this property will always be the first date in . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。The following example creates a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedDates As SelectedDatesCollection

summary.span: 获取选定日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of selected dates.

value.span: 包含当前选定日期的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the currently selected dates.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期可以在单独或在范围中使用添加到集合方法。Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the method. 根据值属性，将日期或范围添加到集合可能导致其被清除。Depending on the value of the property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared. 下表列出如何影响属性。The following table lists how affects the property. |CalendarSelectionModeCalendarSelectionMode|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||不允许选定内容。No selections are allowed. 无法设置并没有值可以添加到。 cannot be set and no values can be added to .| ||可以选择单个日期，通过设置或中的第一个值。Only a single date can be selected, either by setting or the first value in . 不能使用。 cannot be used.| ||只能选择一个日期范围。A single range of dates can be selected. 设置，单独向中添加日期，或使用将清除所有以前的值从。Setting , adding a date individually to , or using will clear all previous values from .| ||可以选择多个非连续范围的日期。Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected. 单独向中添加日期或使用不会清除。Adding a date individually to or using will not clear . 设置仍将清除，但然后可以添加其他日期或范围。Setting will still clear , but additional dates or ranges can then be added. 添加包括某些已选中或与另一个联合中的范围的范围结果重叠，不会导致异常的日期范围。Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects**oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* 一个或多个对象元素。One or more object elements. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有多个所选日期范围。The following example creates a that has multiple ranges of dates selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)]
